author: kohsuke
msg: modified the test harness and fixed some bugs so that all the unit tests will pass

author: saminda
msg: Refactored the scratch code related to RuleEngine, to come up with more
stable, robust and simple rule handling mechanisum. It assumes a simple
single rule code which give intellegence to Mediator to find out more
rules are there for the incomming message.

author: trustin
msg: Changed a link to JIRA changes page to show all previous changes.

author: chinthaka
msg: Adding the ability for attributes to have namespaces. Test case also added with this. But need to do some more testing as to how this works with a bean which has the same namespace.
